pkgmetadata.longdescription: Climate Futures Toolbox // Developed as a collaboration between Earth lab and the North Central Climate Adaptation Science Center to help users gain insights from available climate data. Includes tools and instructions for downloading climate data via a 'USGS' API and then organizing those data for visualization and analysis that drive insight. Web interface for 'USGS' API can be found at http://thredds.northwestknowledg e.net:8080/thredds/reacch_climate_CMIP5_aggregated_macav2_catal og.html.
